parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Hides or enables the given selection for the [[createSimpleObject | simple object]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''hideSelection''' [selection, hidden]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> selection: [[Object]] - simple object
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [selection, hidden]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> selection: [[String]] - selection name
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> hidden: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to hide, [[false]] to show

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value><code>_simpleObject [[hideSelection]] ["some_selection", [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createSimpleObject]], [[selectionNames]]
</value></part></template>
